text: Very rude staff talk so arrogantly to my husband. Food not nice haninan food so so. Doesnt taste authentic. Husband paid with cashless via phone so he shown the staff the payment was done after that husband kept his phone then the staff never said he cant see the code , he(the staff) then proceed to arrogantly said "you think your phone very pretty is it". My husband came back and let me know so i confronted him regards to this and he so scared and denied everything......... Just because my husband is not that fierce, ppl can just anyhow bully him. Yea my husband's phone is iPhone 14 of cause its good. Really disappointed.
Tried the Penang Char Kway Teow. Light on taste. Came with some pork cutlet, shrimps and lots of bean sprouts. Portion wise was still reasonable.
Open till late, portion is okay and tastes not bad. I did not see the offer and almost paid $5 but the staff corrected me and said it is $4. Paid using paylah. Nil issues as faced by previous review

Having tried a few items there already, I do think his regular egg fried rice without any special flavours is very nice. His items are all very worth and damn value. Do eat his original Egg Fried Rice and not mala or what not as its the best and with the pork chop can even rival Din Tai Fung.

The fried rice is absolutely delicious, even better than Ding Tai Fung one. Should try the basic original fried rice as its really damm good. The boss is very hardworking and caring. Its like a family business where he has his wife and son there too. He is very nice and will remember his nice customers.
